attributes.action: No!!! to the extended school hours of 9 - 6pm
attributes.additional_details:
The idea of children being at school from the hours of 9am - 6pm is ridiculous.
This will have a bad effect on family life, social skills and leave others out of work.
The children belong to us not the goverment..
We are asking the department of education to re think... Who is this actually going to help??
